html:
2025-0844
2025-11-28HCFood and Drugs Act
Controlled Drugs and Substances ActRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Food and Drugs Act and the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Controlled Substances)Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Food and Drugs Act and the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Controlled Substances) in order to amend a miscellany of health portfolio regulations to replace references to existing regulations with references to the Controlled Substances Regulations (CSRs) and also amend the Precursor Control Regulations to align with the CSRs.Registration: SOR/2025-0246 Publication Date: 2025-12-17
act:
Food and Drugs Act
Controlled Drugs and Substances Act
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Food and Drugs Act and the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Controlled Substances)
precis: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Food and Drugs Act and the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Controlled Substances) in order to amend a miscellany of health portfolio regulations to replace references to existing regulations with references to the Controlled Substances Regulations (CSRs) and also amend the Precursor Control Regulations to align with the CSRs.
